about.description:
The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.
This package contains the python bindings.

name: python-lalpulsar
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.18.9
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: python-lalpulsar
    version: 1.18.1
source:

    sha256: 38fb0b2d3781eca3f2658ca00c252f85609cdc98229878c70ce32af61f691248
    url: http://software.ligo.org/lscsoft/source/lalsuite/lalpulsar-1.18.1.tar.xz
build:
    error_overdepending: true
    error_overlinking: true
    ignore_run_exports:
        - fftw
    noarch: false
    number: '2'
    script: install-python.sh
    string: py37h6dc4102_2
requirements:

        - cctools 921 h5ba7a2e_4

        - swig 4.0.1 h6de7cb9_0
        - tapi 1000.10.8 h770b8ee_3

        - asn1crypto 1.0.1 py37_0
        - astropy 2.0.15 py37h0b31af3_0

        - gsl 2.5 ha2d443c_1
        - hdf5 1.10.4 nompi_h0cbb7df_1106

        - lal 6.20.2 fftw_h035cc09_105
        - lalpulsar 1.18.1 h6e2a672_2
        - libblas 3.8.0 13_openblas
        - libcblas 3.8.0 13_openblas
        - libcxx 9.0.0 0
        - libcxxabi 9.0.0 0
        - libffi 3.2.1 h6de7cb9_1006
        - libgfortran 3.0.1 0
        - liblapack 3.8.0 13_openblas
        - libopenblas 0.3.7 hd44dcd8_1
        - ligo-common 1.0.4 py_0
        - ligo-segments 1.2.0 py37h01d97ff_1
        - llvm-openmp 9.0.0 h40edb58_0
        - lscsoft-glue 1.60.0 py37h1de35cc_1
        - ncurses 6.1 h0a44026_1002
        - numpy 1.14.6 py37hdf140aa_1201
        - openssl 1.1.1c h01d97ff_0
        - py 1.8.0 py_0
        - pycparser 2.19 py37_1
        - pyopenssl 19.0.0 py37_0
        - pytest 3.2.2 py_0
        - python 3.7.3 h93065d6_1
        - python-dateutil 2.8.0 py_0

        - readline 8.0 hcfe32e1_0
        - scipy 1.3.1 py37hab3da7d_2
        - setuptools 41.4.0 py37_0
        - six 1.12.0 py37_1000
        - sqlite 3.30.1 h93121df_0
        - tk 8.6.9 h2573ce8_1003
        - xz 5.2.4 h1de35cc_1001
        - zlib 1.2.11 h0b31af3_1006
    run:
        - astropy
        - gsl >=2.5,<2.6.0a0
        - lal >=6.20.0
        - lal >=6.20.2,<6.21.0a0
        - lalpulsar 1.18.1 h6e2a672_2

        - python >=3.7,<3.8.0a0

test:
    imports:
        - lalpulsar
        - lalpulsar.NstarTools
        - lalpulsar.PulsarParametersWrapper
        - lalpulsar.simulateCW
about:
    description: 'The LSC Algorithm Pulsar Library for gravitational wave data analysis.

extra:
